commit.message:
tree-switch-conversion.c (emit_case_bit_tests): Generate MINUS_EXPR in unsigned type.

2012-08-06  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>

	* tree-switch-conversion.c (emit_case_bit_tests): Generate MINUS_EXPR in
	unsigned type.

From-SVN: r190168
